title: ollama/ollama
summary: The core Ollama project that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial Rust-based CLI that wraps Ollama with additional helpers like prompt templates and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (haystack-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with streaming and async support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, and optional GPU flags.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy dependency injection in TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET client for Ollama on NuGet with async streaming and chat completions.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library (available on Hex) for integrating Ollama models into Phoenix applications.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models, deployed via a single Docker container.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by any Ollama model for brainstorming notes.
